title: Incident 1
scenario: You receive an alert that a Production SQS queue has high oldest message age.

title: Incident 2
scenario: You receive a report that a customer is unable to sign a contract.

title: Incident 3
scenario: After merging a PR, you are notified that the deployment to Develop failed.

title: Incident 4
scenario: A customer reports that their data from an external platform is not syncing to Constrafor.

title: Incident 5
scenario: It is discovered that Constrafor is exposing customer PII through the public API.

title: Incident 6
scenario: You are alerted that backend endpoints are experiencing an elevated error rate.

title: Incident 7
scenario: A specific e2e test is consistently failing.

title: Incident 8
scenario: You need to update to the latest version of Postgres in Production.

title: Incident 9
scenario: Platform data has mistakenly been deleted or overwritten in Production.
